projects.title: Kenya National Surgical Services Strategic Plan 2025–2030
projects.summary: Consultancy to develop a comprehensive, multisectoral, and costed roadmap to transform surgical care delivery across all levels of the health system.
projects.long_description: The Kenya National Surgical Services Strategic Plan 2025–2030 provides a comprehensive framework for transforming surgical care delivery across all levels of Kenya's health system. This strategic plan addresses critical gaps in surgical capacity, infrastructure, and workforce development through evidence-based interventions and multi-sectoral collaboration.
key_achievements: Comprehensive multi-sectoral strategic framework developed
Costed roadmap for surgical care transformation created
Stakeholder validation process initiated across health system levels

projects.title: Nairobi County Mental Health Strategic Plan 2025–2030
projects.summary: Lead consultancy delivering strategic plan focused on integrating primary health care systems for inclusive community-centered mental health services.
projects.long_description: The Nairobi County Mental Health Strategic Plan 2025–2030 represents a groundbreaking approach to mental health service delivery in Kenya's capital. The plan integrates primary health care systems to create inclusive, community-centered mental health services that are accessible, culturally appropriate, and evidence-based.
key_achievements: Successfully launched comprehensive mental health strategic plan
Integrated primary health care approach developed
Community-centered service delivery model established

projects.title: Mid-term Review of the National Supply Chain Strategy 2020–2025
projects.summary: Comprehensive mid-term review of Kenya's national supply chain strategy implementation and performance assessment.
projects.long_description: This mid-term review evaluated the implementation progress of Kenya's National Supply Chain Strategy 2020–2025, assessing performance against key indicators and providing recommendations for strategic adjustments to enhance supply chain effectiveness in the health sector.
key_achievements: Comprehensive strategy implementation assessment completed
Key performance indicators evaluated and benchmarked
Strategic recommendations developed for enhanced effectiveness

projects.title: Cost Benefit Analysis for ZAR 10.8B South African Tender
projects.summary: Cost-benefit and cost-effectiveness analysis for major healthcare infrastructure tender in Free State Province, South Africa.
projects.long_description: Conducted comprehensive cost-benefit and cost-effectiveness analysis for a major healthcare infrastructure tender valued at ZAR 10.8 billion (USD 570.4 million) in Free State Province, South Africa. The analysis provided critical financial modeling and economic evaluation to support decision-making.
key_achievements: Complex financial modeling for multi-billion rand tender completed
Cost-effectiveness analysis delivered within tight timeline
Strategic recommendations provided for tender optimization

projects.title: R4D Health Systems Strengthening Project Ghana
projects.summary: Strengthening primary health service delivery and community health systems within Ghana Health Services framework.
projects.long_description: This project focused on strengthening primary health service delivery and community health systems within the Ghana Health Services framework. The intervention aimed to improve health service quality, accessibility, and community engagement through evidence-based health systems strengthening approaches.
key_achievements: Primary health service delivery systems strengthened
Community health engagement mechanisms enhanced
Ghana Health Services capacity building implemented

projects.title: Kenya COVID-19 Health Emergency Response Project 7th KAP Survey
projects.summary: Lead consultancy for the 7th Knowledge, Attitude, and Practice survey under Kenya's COVID-19 health emergency response framework.
projects.long_description: Led the implementation of the 7th Knowledge, Attitude, and Practice (KAP) survey as part of Kenya's COVID-19 Health Emergency Response Project (CHERP), providing critical insights into public health behaviors and informing policy decisions.
key_achievements: Comprehensive KAP survey methodology developed and implemented
High-quality data collection across multiple regions achieved
Policy-relevant insights generated for emergency response planning

projects.title: National Ear & Hearing Care Strategic Plan 2023–2028
projects.summary: Development of costed National Ear & Hearing Care Strategic Plan and Policy for Kenya, funded by WHO.
projects.long_description: Developed a comprehensive, costed National Ear & Hearing Care Strategic Plan 2023–2028 and accompanying policy framework for Kenya, addressing critical gaps in ear and hearing care services across the health system.
key_achievements: Comprehensive strategic plan for ear and hearing care developed
Detailed costing framework for implementation created
National policy framework established for hearing care services

projects.title: UNICEF Nutrition Improvement Project
projects.summary: Comprehensive nutrition improvement initiative focusing on maternal and child nutrition outcomes in Kenya.
projects.long_description: Implemented comprehensive nutrition improvement strategies focusing on maternal and child nutrition outcomes, working with UNICEF Kenya to strengthen nutrition service delivery and community-based nutrition programs.
key_achievements: Nutrition service delivery systems enhanced
Community-based nutrition programs strengthened
Maternal and child nutrition outcomes improved

projects.title: Maternal & Child Health Initiative Project
projects.summary: Associate consultancy delivering significant improvements in maternal mortality rates and immunization coverage across target regions.
projects.long_description: This maternal and child health initiative achieved remarkable results, reducing maternal mortality rates by 15% and increasing immunization coverage to 95% in target regions through evidence-based interventions and community engagement strategies.
key_achievements: Maternal mortality rate reduced by 15% in target regions
Immunization coverage increased to 95%
Community health systems strengthened significantly

projects.title: DFID HIV/AIDS Prevention Project
projects.summary: Large-scale HIV/AIDS prevention initiative reaching over 100,000 individuals with testing and counseling services.
projects.long_description: Implemented comprehensive HIV/AIDS prevention strategies under DFID funding, successfully reaching over 100,000 individuals with testing and counseling services while strengthening local health system capacity for HIV prevention and care.
key_achievements: Reached 100,000+ individuals with testing and counseling
HIV prevention strategies successfully implemented
Local health system capacity for HIV care strengthened

projects.title: Kenya iCCM Implementation Framework and Policy Development
projects.summary: Associate consultancy developing integrated Community Case Management framework through systematic review and stakeholder validation.
projects.long_description: Contributed to the development of Kenya's integrated Community Case Management (iCCM) Implementation Framework and Policy Plan of Action through comprehensive systematic review, KHIS analysis, and extensive stakeholder validation processes.
key_achievements: Comprehensive iCCM implementation framework developed
Systematic review and KHIS analysis completed
Multi-stakeholder validation process successfully conducted

projects.title: AMR Data Analysis Manual Development
projects.summary: Associate consultancy for antimicrobial resistance data analysis manual development under Wellcome Trust-supported project.
projects.long_description: Developed comprehensive data analysis manual for antimicrobial resistance (AMR) research and surveillance as part of a Wellcome Trust-supported project, providing standardized methodologies for AMR data collection, analysis, and interpretation.
key_achievements: Comprehensive AMR data analysis manual developed
Standardized methodologies for AMR surveillance established
Technical capacity for AMR research enhanced
